snippet: The Kentucky star A. J. Reed won the Dick Howser Trophy as the top player in college baseball. Reed hit 23 home runs and had a 12-2 record as a pitcher.
abstract: Kentucky star A J Reed wins the Dick Howser Trophy as the top player in college baseball; he hit 23 home runs and had a 12-2 record as a pitcher; other news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Kentucky star A. J. Reed won the Dick Howser Trophy as the top player in college baseball. Reed hit 23 home runs and had a 12-2 record as a pitcher.

headline.main: Kentucky Star Named Top Player in College Baseball
